title: Adele accidentally BREAKS her Grammy Award for Record of the Year
text:
THAT WASN'T MEANT TO HAPPEN! Adele accidentally BREAKS her Grammy Award for Record of the Year 
The singer enjoyed a good giggle on stage as she held up the two pieces By ROSE HILL Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments ADELE rounded off her triumphant evening at the Grammys by accidentally breaking her big gong of the night while on stage. 
Soon after giving an emotional speech for her Album of the Year win, she accidentally pulled apart her trophy. Reuters 8 Adele accidentally pulled apart her Grammy Award for Record of the Year 
She didn’t seem too fussed, however, and had a good giggle with her team as she held up the two pieces. 
It was an emotional evening for Adele and she couldn’t help sobbing after receiving her final award for Album of the Year, commenting that she couldn’t accept the award because she felt it should have gone to Beyonce. 
Even the Lemonade singer was struggling to keep back the tears as Adele gave a heartfelt speech praising her. Reuters The singer showed off the parts she’d pulled off Reuters She giggled with her team while celebrating her fifth win of the night AP:Associated Press 8 Adele scooped up five Grammy Awards this evening 
Speaking about her comeback, she said that it “took an army” to help her get her latest album off the ground. 
Adele said: “I struggled and I still do struggle being a mum but this made me feel in some way like I have got some of myself back again.” Getty Images Adele couldn’t help getting emotional after winning the Grammy for Album of the Year Getty Images Adele said that she couldn’t accept the award because she felt Beyonce deserved it RELATED STORIES 'Of course I love Drake' Jennifer Lopez gushes over 'talented and amazing' Drake after Grammy's quiz on fling perils of live TV Lady Gaga and Metallica's fiery duet falters at Grammys as unlikely pair hit by technical mishap 'I CAN'T MESS THIS UP' Adele sobs and turns the air blue on live TV as she demands to restart tribute to George Michael during Grammys show HITTING TOP NOTES Chrissy Teigen, Charlie XCX, Heidi Klum and Paris Jackson stun on the red carpet at the Grammys STEALING THE SHOW Beyonce's adorable daughter Blue Ivy watches mum's Grammys show in sharp pink suit GETTING IT OFF HER CHEST Lady Gaga shows off plenty of underboob at Grammys 2017 in extremely revealing cut out crop top bump's big night Beyonce debuts baby bump at the Grammys 2017 as she takes to stage and performs Mother's Pride 
But she glanced down to where Beyonce and her family were sitting and said: “I can’t accept this award because, for me, Beyonce, Lemonade was amazing. 
“It was so monumental and so soul bearing. We saw another side of you that we don’t always get to see. We adore you, you are our light. The way you make me feel, and the way you make my black friends feel, is amazing. I love you so much, I always have and always will.” AP:Associated Press Beyonce looked stunning as she performed for the first time since announcing she is pregnant 
This evening Adele also won Song of the Year, Best Pop Solo Performance and Best Vocal Album. 
Despite being up for nine Grammys this year, Beyonce bagged just two for Best Urban Contemporary Album and Best Music Video. AP:Associated Press
